Name: Frequency of \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ in relation to \SW-AE Assign Reviewers\
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that proceed from \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ to \SW-Awaiting EIC Decision\
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Percentage of \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ occurrences out of all activities in the review process
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ followed by \SW-EIC Major Revision\ or \SW-EIC Minor Revision\
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases with \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ that lead to a decision (accept or reject) without further major revisions
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ activities that occur after \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2\
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' occurs

Name: Percentage of \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ activities that are preceded by \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ in manuscripts that require more than one round of reviews
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ followed by \SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit\ in comparison to those followed by \SW-EIC Accept\
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': "activity == 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit' || activity == 'SW-EIC Accept'"}

Name: Average number of days between \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ and the next activity in the process
Frequency of \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ in relation to the total number of activities performed by the SYSTEM performer
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ occurrences that lead to a manuscript being accepted for publication
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ activities that occur before \SW-Reviewer No Response\
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response' occurs

Name: Percentage of \SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation\ that result in a manuscript undergoing major revisions versus minor revisions
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
